sourcesContent: import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { GetBreedsService } from "src/app/shared/services/getBreeds.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-breeds-list", templateUrl: "./breeds-list.component.html", styleUrls: ["./breeds-list.component.scss"], }) export class BreedsListComponent { public breeds; constructor(private http: HttpClient, public getBreedService: GetBreedsService) { this.breeds = getBreedService.getBreeds().subscribe((data) => { this.breeds = data; }); } public getPrevious(){ this.breeds = this.getBreedService.getPreviousBreeds(this.breeds).subscribe((data) => { this.breeds = data; }); } public getNext(){ this.breeds = this.getBreedService.getPreviousBreeds(this.breeds).subscribe((data) => { this.breeds = data; }); } }
